mapper.insert: insert into t_album(title, device, views, `like`, description, create_time, update_time, user_id, urls) values(#{title}, #{device}, #{views}, #{like}, #{description}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userId}, #{urls});
mapper.update: update t_album set title = #{title}, device = #{device}, views = #{views}, `like` = #{like}, description = #{description}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime}, user_id = #{userId}, urls = #{urls} where id = #{id};
